Uses of Interface
org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.AssemblyTransformationService

  • Packages that use AssemblyTransformationService 
    Package Description
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly
    The assembly package contains objects for working with genomic data that has been assembled into Contigs and Scaffolds.
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.clc.cas.transform  
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed.transform  
    org.jcvi.jillion.sam.transform
    This package transforms SAM encoded files into other assembly "contexts" using AssemblyTransformer.

    • Uses of AssemblyTransformationService in org.jcvi.jillion.sam.transform

      Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.sam.transform that implement AssemblyTransformationService 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PaddedSamTransformationService
      PaddedSamTransformationService is a class that can parse a paddedSAM file was produced from a denovo assembler and contains the padded read alignments to a padded reference/consensus and call the appropriate methods on a given AssemblyTransformer so the transformer can get assembly and alignment information from the padded SAM file without knowing anything about how SAM files are formatted.
      class  SamTransformationService
      SamTransformationService is a class that can parse a SAM file and call the appropriate methods on a given AssemblyTransformer so the transformer can get assembly and alignment information from the SAM file without knowing anything about how SAM files are formatted.
